document_data.name: Gum tree
document_data.mainbody: '''Gum''' trees could be found in various places in [[Faerûn]], including the west [[starwood]] area of the forest of [[Cormanthor]],<ref> as well as the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[Zakhara]].<ref>
document_data.Varieties: '''Black gum''' grew in the [[Vast Swamp]] of [[Cormyr]].
